documentation.author: Cerner Model
documentation.purpose:
Alert appears when a patient’s chart is opened by users in Physician positions (except for the “Physician – Emergency Medicine” position) to prompt the provider to complete a certification PowerForm satisfying the two-midnight rule if the form has not already been completed. The rule pairs with the PSO_INPT_CERTIFICATION rule to accomodate for workflows when the PSO Admit to Inpatient order is placed by an Emergency provider, or if the patient's insurance is changed to Medicare/Medicare Advantage after being admitted.
Alert displays when the patient’s encounter type is “Inpatient”, the patient’s insurance is “Medicare” or “Medicare Advantage”, the order “PSO Admit to Inpatient” is active on the patient’s chart, there isn’t an “Inpatient Certification” form documented on the encounter.
The Certification Form flexes when the requested location is “Behavioral Health” and/or the patient’s facility is a Critical Access Hospital
documentation.impact:
The Following templates require reinstantiation to localize content at client sites:
E1 - POSITION should be populated with all positions who should receive this openchart alert
L3 - DETAIL_VALUE should be populated with local values for financial class that signify Medicare
L4 - Inside the parenthesis, all applicable code_values for Medicare insurance on codeset 354 should be added and separated by commas
L8/L9 - LIST1 should be populated with local values for order details that signify admission to behavioral health
L11 - DETAIL_VALUE should be populated with local locations that signify 'Critical Access Hospitals'

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_STOP_LOGIC_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the following templates are false, MODE logic evaluation
templateDefinitions.description: Used to control efficiency of Action Group rules

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ENCOUNTER_DETAIL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the patient's ENC_DETAIL QUAL DETAIL_VALUE for the same encounter as OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CALC_SAVE_L
templateDefinitions.description: Create a value to be used by subsequent templates

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDERS_FIND_L
templateDefinitions.definition: orders exist ORD_METHOD OPT_ORDERS with order status of OPT_ORDER_STATUS on OPT_SCOPE OPT_LINK whose date criteria is OPT_QUAL OPT_TIME_NUM OPT_TIME_UNIT from the anchor OPT_ANCHOR_DT_TM.

column.value: link to other template by the same accession_id
link to other template by the same encounter_id

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CE_NORMALCY_L
templateDefinitions.definition: The most recent result for EVENT_SET_NAME has a result status of STATUS and NORMALCY normalcy on the same encounter as OPT_LINK within the last OPT_TIME_NUM OPT_TIME_UNIT.

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDERS_DETAIL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the order detail ORDER_DETAIL QUALIFIER LIST for any order(s) in LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ENCOUNTER_LOC_DETAIL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the patient's ENC_DETAIL that QUAL in DETAIL_VALUE for the same encounter as OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CE_CREATE_CODED_CE_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Create a STATUS, OPT_NORMALCY, EVENT_NAME result of VALUE1 OPT_UNITS_OF_MEASURE on the same encounter as LINK with OPT_COMMENT_TYPE of OPT_COMMENT and RESEND send this event back through Discern Expert. OPT_INHERIT_DYN_LABEL inherit the dynamic label, if one exisits.

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ALERT_FLEX_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Send alert OPT_TITLE stating TXT, OPT_CANCEL_LABEL, OPT_IGNORE_LABEL, OPT_OVERRIDE_REASON, OPT_MODIFY_LABEL, OPT_DEFAULT_LABEL, OPT_ORDERS, OPT_DEFAULT_FIRST_ORDER, OPT_URL_BUTTON_NAME, OPT_URL_ADDRESS, OK_BUTTON_NAME, OPT_FORM, OPT_FORM_BUTTON_NAME, OPT_FORCE_FORM, OPT_LINK

statements.statement: select distinct Form_Definition = if (t.seq = 1) dfr.definition else "*NONE" endif, _hidden = if (t.seq = 1) dfr.dcp_forms_ref_id else 0.0 endif, Description = if (t.seq = 1) dfr.description else "NONE" endif from dcp_forms_ref dfr, (dummyt t with seq=2) plan dfr where dfr.active_ind = 1 and textlen(trim(dfr.definition)) > 0 and textlen(trim(dfr.definition)) > 0 join t order Form_Definition

column.value: PowerPorm must be opened, dismiss Alert
PowerForm must be signed, dismiss Alert

value.value: SELECT HP.ACTIVE_IND FROM ENCNTR_PLAN_RELTN E, HEALTH_PLAN HP PLAN E WHERE E.ENCNTR_ID = @ENCOUNTERID:{Encounter} JOIN HP WHERE E.HEALTH_PLAN_ID = HP.HEALTH_PLAN_ID AND HP.FINANCIAL_CLASS_CD IN (634778.00,634777.00,634776.00)@NEWLINEDETAIL log_misc1 = "FOUND" go

values.value: PSO Admit to Inpatient Behavioral Health

value.value: @patient:{Encounter} needs a certification form documented. Please click on the 'Certification' button below to access the Inpatient Certification PowerForm, verify all documentation is correct, and sign.

@patient:{Encounter} needs a certification form documented. Please click on the 'Certification' button below to access the Inpatient Certification PowerForm, verify all documentation is correct, and sign.
